subs.text: Threadviewer is back up. I have to admit to having serious brainfog about this project, but I slowed down, and did some more verbs docs, and just got it working much better than it was previously. Here's the deal.
I posted a test thread and here's the threadviewer view of it.
That should continue to work, even as I post more tweets through the night and into tomorrow (knock wood).
It should also reflect any additions and deletions to the thread.
However after 24 hours, it will disappear. Obviously that's not good! But one step at a time. I want to make sure this much works as I expect it would.
